Class QuestionButtonLayout

java.lang.Object
  LinearLayout
      cvut.fel.mobilevoting.murinrad.gui.QuestionButtonLayout

public class QuestionButtonLayout
extends LinearLayout

The container that houses a question button, it enables the display of checkers

Author:
Radovan Murin
